sentences.en: He is getting older and older, So he almost lose all of his interest except horticulture.
sentences.cn: 他年纪越来越大, 除了喜欢园艺以外,对一切都失去了兴趣.

sentences.en: How did the Horticulture Expo in Kunming strike you?
sentences.cn: 你觉得昆明的世博会搞得怎样(你的印象如何)?

sentences.en: I set up with the 1997 Division, Main recreational sports products, horticulture, flag poles, hunting supplies.

sentences.en: It is forbidden to occupy basic farmland to develop horticulture or dig ponds to breed fish.
sentences.cn: 禁止占用基本农田发展林果业和挖塘养鱼.

sentences.en: It is forbidden to occupy basic farmland to develop horticulture.
sentences.cn: 禁止占用基本农田发展林果业。

sentences.en: Panxi restaurant has a strong horticulture characteristic of the south gardens.
sentences.cn: 泮溪酒店的建筑具有浓厚的岭南庭园艺术特色.

sentences.en: The area has a long tradition of horticulture.
sentences.cn: 园艺是这个地区源远流长的传统。

sentences.en: The dominant idea was to be the glorification of horticulture and the exaltation of agriculture.
sentences.cn: 其主题是对园艺的赞颂,以及对农艺感到兴奋.

sentences.en: The Novarbo Substrates for professional horticulture are based on sphagnum peat.
sentences.cn: 专业的园艺栽培基质-诺万播,源于优质的泥炭藓资源.

sentences.en: This was the first proposed curvilinear glass roof for horticulture.
sentences.cn: 这是园艺的首先提出的曲线玻璃屋顶.

sentences.en: Thus, to earn a Plant Science merit badge, a scout can choose between agronomy, horticulture, or field botany.
sentences.cn: 因此，为了赚取植物科学奖章，一个童子军可以选择农学，园艺，或田野植物学。

sentences.en: We can kill time ( pass the time ) by doing horticulture ( gardening ) when we are older.
sentences.cn: 园艺是一种学问,它包含很多我们青少年所不懂的知识,这对于我们是困难的,难懂的.

sentences.en: World Horticulture Exposition garden: hosted the International Horticultural Exposition in 2006.
sentences.cn: 世界园艺博览园: 在2006年举办了世界园艺博览会.
